title: 求一个插件
author: 小张up
txt_content: 插件很简单：玩家掉虚空直接把玩家干死即可找半天没找到。

replies.author: 深拥v
replies.txt_content:
做个命令方块，kill @p，上面放个压力板
然后
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... B61%5D%5Btype%5D%3D
懂我意思吧

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-733962-1-1.html 这里的 BaseLobby

playerprotect:
  #掉入虚空执行命令（后台）
  void:
  - 'mv tp %player% world'
